fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Primary and secondary legislation on foodstuffs and environment.  
General business environment. Reform of the common agricultural policy and relevant topics (reform of the EU budget, cohesion policy etc.)
relevant_communication: All policy documents relevant to the review of the EU Common agricultural policy, reform of the Cohesion policy as an outcome of the EU budget review and Brexit implicataions.
goals__remit: Professional consultancy for businesses, focused on agriculture, foodstuffs and related fields. Lobbying and interaction with relevant policy-makers in the EU institutions. Defending interests of the founding members towards the institutions.
